alert.note: Alert for Dimmit (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dimmit County through 130 PM CDT... At 1244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrizo Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrizo Springs, Big Wells, Asherton, Winter Haven, Brundage, Carrizo Hill and Chula Vista-River Spur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
